trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService" />.
The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 모델은 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 이벤트와 처리기를 연결 하는 이벤트 대리자에 따라 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, two elements are needed:
trans-unit.target: 발생 시키는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> 이벤트, 두 개의 요소가 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class, derived from <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which holds the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> 에서 파생 된 클래스 <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>, 이벤트 데이터를 보유 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> 이벤트에 대 한 응답을 제공 하는 메서드를 가리키는 대리자입니다.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> 대리자를 만들 때, 이벤트를 처리할 메서드를 식별합니다.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 이벤트 처리기와 연결하려면 대리자의 인스턴스를 해당 이벤트에 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 대리자를 제거하지 않는 경우 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 이벤트 처리기가 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기 대리자에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)합니다.
